t: Good,Bad, or Ugly? APEX TOOL GROUP (Danaher+Cooper) | The Garage Journal
s: December 29, 2011 - I order a lot of Armstrong tools from Apex for work. It seems to me that Apex keeps its high end brands like Armstrong USA made, while letting their lower end brands like Gearwrench be made overseas. Click to expand... you think gear wrench is a lower end brand ... My Fluke 88V is made here also. Click to expand... Made here or just designed here? ... Cooper ...

t: Apex Tool Group - Wikipedia
s: 3 weeks ago - Apex Tool Group is an American supplier of hand tools and power tools. It was formed as a joint venture of Cooper Industries and Danaher by the merger of Cooper Tools and Danaher's Tools and Components segment. In October 2012, Danaher and Cooper sold Apex to Bain Capital for about $1.6 billion.
